text: @ManCityCouncil @CllrMaryM @EnvAgencyNW @NorthendenForum @love_northenden As at these days, here's the look of things (actually, a bit worse). Table still unanchored, pretty hazardous with all the broken slats. Not much progress in almost 2 months, don't you agree? Meanwhile, we pay our council tax & we exercise by this spot every day, by this damage. https://t.co/fpUhqX8VGt
